SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: TRUST, MEDIA AND DEMOCRACY:THE FOUNDATION SUPPORTED SIGNIFICANT OPINION RESEARCH AND SURVEYS CONDUCTED BY INDEPENDENT THIRD-PARTY FIRMS AS PART OF TRUST, MEDIA AND DEMOCRACY INITIATIVE. THIS INITIATIVE EXPLORES THE ROLE OF TRUST IN JOURNALISM IN OUR DEMOCRACY. THESE RESEARCH AND SURVEYS EXPLORED ATTITUDES AS WELL AS WAYS TO BUILD TRUST IN INFORMATION. THE SURVEYS WERE PUBLICLY DISSEMINATED VIA SEVERAL MEDIUMS SO THAT THEY COULD BE WIDELY AVAILABLE.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: JOURNALISM AND DEMOCRACY INITIATIVE:SUPPORTED KNIGHT'S JOURNALISM AND DEMOCRACY INITIATIVE THROUGH WIDE DISSEMINATION OF REPORTS AND PROMOTION OF THE INITIATIVE. KNIGHT LAUNCHED THE INITIATIVE BY RELEASING THE REPORT OF THE KNIGHT COMMISSION ON TRUST, MEDIA AND DEMOCRACY, DEVELOPED WITH THE ASPEN INSTITUTE, THEN ANNOUNCED A SERIES OF LARGE JOURNALISM GRANTS ORGANIZATIONS SEEKING TO BUILD A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE FOR LOCAL NEWS, AND INVESTED IN MULTIMEDIA TO EDUCATE OTHER FUNDERS ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF LOCAL NEWS AND THE FUNDING OPPORTUNITIES. KNIGHT THEN MADE AND ANNOUNCED A SERIES OF GRANTS TO MULTIDISCIPLINARY INSTITUTIONS RESEARCHING THE INTERNET'S EFFECT ON DEMOCRACY, AND LAID THE GROUNDWORK FOR AN AD CAMPAIGN TO ENCOURAGE YOUNG PEOPLE TO CONNECT WITH THEIR FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHTS TO FREE EXPRESSION. COMBINED, THIS EDUCATIONAL CAMPAIGN PROMOTES & AMPLIFIES THE WORK OF OUR GRANTEES, EDUCATES COMMUNITIES ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF LOCAL NEW TO OUR DEMOCRACY & ENRICHES THE FIELD OF STUDY.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description3Txt: KNIGHT MEDIA FORUM:THE KNIGHT MEDIA FORUM IS THE PREMIER GATHERING FOR FUNDERS AND MEDIA LEADERS WORKING TO STRENGTHEN LOCAL NEWS, COMMUNITY AND DEMOCRACY. THE CONVENING HAS EVOLVED OVER THE PAST TWELVE YEARS TO A 600-PERSON CONFERENCE WHICH INCLUDES LEARNING EVENTS WITH EXPERTS AND LEADING PRACTITIONERS IN THESE AREAS. PARTICIPANTS LEAVE WITH I) AWARENESS OF CUTTING-EDGE ISSUES AND MAJOR TRENDS IN COMMUNITY NEWS AND INFORMATION, II) PRACTICAL TOOLS AND REPLICABLE IDEAS AND III) NEW PARTNERSHIPS AND RELATIONSHIPS TO HELP EXECUTE PROJECTS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description4Txt: THE 100 MILLION PROJECT:THIS COMPREHENSIVE NON-PARTISAN STUDY OF 12,000 CHRONIC NON-VOTERS EXPLORES THEIR VIEWS, ATTITUDES AND BEHAVIORS ON A WIDE RANGE OF TOPICS TO HELP UNDERSTAND THE 100 MILLION ELIGIBLE VOTERS WHO DID NOT VOTE IN THE 2016 ELECTION. THIS ACADEMICALLY RIGOROUS STUDY HOPES TO ADD TO THE FIELD OF STUDY ON DEMOCRATIC ENGAGEMENT AS PART OF KNIGHT'S MISSION TO SUPPORT INFORMED AND ENGAGED COMMUNITIES. THE WORK INCLUDED SIGNIFICANT OPINION RESEARCH AND SURVEYS CONDUCTED BY INDEPENDENT THIRD-PARTY FIRMS THAT WERE WIDELY DISSEMINATED TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC THROUGH REPORTS, AN INTERACTIVE WEBSITE AND A MEDIA AND SOCIAL MEDIA CAMPAIGN. THE STUDY EXAMINED NON-VOTERS THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY AND ACROSS THE POLITICAL SPECTRUM, AT EVERY LEVEL OF EDUCATION AND INCOME, AND ACROSS A BROAD ARRAY OF DEMOGRAPHIC GROUPS.

SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description1Txt: HISTORIC MACON FOUNDATION, INC:TO COMPLETE THE REVITALIZATION OF THE HISTORIC BEALL'S HILL NEIGHBORHOOD WITHIN THE COLLEGE HILL CORRIDOR AND SERVE AS A NATIONAL MODEL THROUGH A COMBINATION OF GRANT AND PROGRAM-RELATED INVESTMENTS ESTABLISHING PERPETUAL REVOLVING LOAN FUNDS FOR REHABILITATING HOMES, BUILDING NEW HOMES, FACADE IMPROVEMENTS, AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY PROJECTS.
SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description2Txt: LAB305, LLC:LOCATED IN A HISTORICALLY UNDERINVESTED COMMUNITY, LAB 305 CONNECTS MIAMI'S EMERGING ENTREPRENEURS WITH THE CORPORATE COMMUNITY THROUGH EVENTS, EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES AND OTHER ACTIVITIES THAT SPUR INNOVATION AND HELP LAUNCH AND SCALE NEW IDEAS.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: APPLICATIONS FOR FUNDING ARE SUBMITTED ELECTRONICALLY VIA THE FOUNDATION WEBSITE. PLEASE GO TO WWW.KF.ORG TO APPLY FOR A GRANT. FOR JOURNALISM, COMMUNITIES, NATIONAL AND ARTS PROGRAMS, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IN OUR ONLINE FORM: TELL US ABOUT THE OPPORTUNITY PRESENTED BY YOUR IDEA/PROJECT, WHAT IT WILL TRANSFORM, AND THE IMPACT IT WILL HAVE. HOW WILL IT CREATE LASTING, VISIBLE CHANGE? TELL US HOW YOU INDENTIFIED THIS OPPORTUNITY AND WHY THE TIME IS RIGHT FOR IT. WHAT OTHER PARTNERS OR FUNDERS ARE INVOLVED IN THE IDEA/PROJECT? HOW WILL YOU MEASURE SUCCESS? HOW ARE YOU UNIQUELY QUALIFIED TO IMPLEMENT YOUR IDEA/PROJECT? PLEASE DESCRIBE ORGANIZATIONAL AND FINANCIAL CAPACITY TO IMPLEMENT YOUR IDEA/PROJECT INCLUDING ANY BUSINESS PLAN. HOW WILL YOUR IDEA/PROJECT BE SUSTAINED BEYOND KNIGHT FOUNDATION'S FUNDING?
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: WITH THE EXCEPTION OF SPECIAL INITIATIVES AND CONTESTS, THE FOUNDATION DOES NOT HAVE DEADLINES.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: ANY RESTRICTIONS OR LIMITATIONS ON AWARDS, SUCH AS BY GEOGRAPHICAL AREAS, CHARITABLE FIELDS, KIND OF INSTITUTIONS OR OTHER FACTORS: -MEDICAL RESEARCH, ORGANIZATIONS OR PROJECTS WHOSE MISSION IS TO PREVENT, ERADICATE AND/OR ALLEVIATE THE EFFECTS OF A SPECIFIC DISEASE -POLITICAL CAMPAIGNS AND LEGISLATIVE LOBBYING EFFORTS -PROJECTS THAT EXCLUSIVELY SERVE RELIGIOUS PURPOSES -DIRECT SUPPORT FOR INDIVIDUALS
